title: More than 1,000 MCAS essays scored incorrectly due to AI mishap
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Education The temporary technical issue impacted an average of one or two students' scores in each of the 145 affected districts.
A Waltham High School student writes a practice MCAS essay in 2005.
Tom Landers/The Boston Globe Approximately 1,400 MCAS essays were scored incorrectly due to an AI-grading mishap, according to the state Department of Elementary and Secondary Education.

title: Machine Gun Kelly speaks about haters to the students at Harvard Business School
author: Megan Johnson
bullets: Celebs "The more silent people are probably the ones that I need to care more about.
" MGK, formerly known as Machine Gun Kelly, had a few words of advice for the students of Harvard Business School earlier this week.

The musician, who has dipped his toes into everything from rap to pop to punk, hit the hallowed halls of Harvard University in Boston’s Allston neighborhood to serve as a guest speaker at the Business School’s Entertainment and Media Club, where he spoke candidly about how he deals with his haters.
